Properties.ProtectedString:
--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Sounds = { Slash = Handle:WaitForChild("Slash"), Unsheath = Handle:WaitForChild("Unsheath") }
Animations = { {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("LeftSlash"), Speed = 2, Duration = 0.4}, {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("RightSlash"), Speed = 2, Duration = 0.4}, }
R15Animations = { {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("R15LeftSlash"), Speed = 2, Duration = 0.4}, {Animation = Tool:WaitForChild("R15RightSlash"), Speed = 2, Duration = 0.4} }
Equipped = false Active = false
Damage = 5 SpecialDamage = 12.5
SpecialReady = false SpecialActive = false Kills = 0 KillsNeeded = 5
ServerControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ServerControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ServerControl.Name = "ServerControl" ServerControl.Parent = Tool
ClientControl = (Tool:FindFirstChild("ClientControl") or Instance.new("RemoteFunction")) ClientControl.Name = "ClientControl" ClientControl.Parent = Tool
BasePart = Instance.new("Part") BasePart.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic BasePart.Shape = Enum.PartType.Block BasePart.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth BasePart.CanCollide = false BasePart.Anchored = true BasePart.Locked = true
for i, v in pairs(Handle:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("Sparkles") then v:Destroy() end end
ServerControl.OnServerInvoke = (function(player, Mode, Value) if player ~= Player or Humanoid.Health == 0 or not Tool.Enabled then return end if Mode == "Click" and Value then Tool.Enabled = false Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 32 Active = true Attack() if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent then Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end Active = false Tool.Enabled = true elseif Mode == "KeyPress" and Value.Key == "q" and Value.Down then if not SpecialReady then return end local Radius = 50 local Hit, HitPosition = RayCast((Torso.CFrame + Torso.CFrame.lookVector * (Radius + (Torso.Size.Z / 2))).p, Vector3.new(0, -1, 0), (Torso.Size.Y * 2), {Character}) if Hit then SpecialReady = false SpecialActive = true if Sparkles and Sparkles.Parent then Sparkles:Destroy() end local RadiusModel = Instance.new("Model") RadiusModel.Name = "RadiusModel" local RadiusPartBase = BasePart:Clone() RadiusPartBase.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Really red") RadiusPartBase.Transparency = 0.5 RadiusPartBase.Size = Vector3.new((Radius * 2), 0.2, (Radius * 2)) local CylinderMesh = Instance.new("CylinderMesh") CylinderMesh.Parent = RadiusPartBase RadiusBaseTop = RadiusPartBase:Clone() RadiusBaseTop.Transparency = 0.75 RadiusBaseTop.Size = Vector3.new(RadiusBaseTop.Size.X, 1.5, RadiusBaseTop.Size.Z) PointLight = Instance.new("PointLight") PointLight.Brightness = 50 PointLight.Color = RadiusPartBase.BrickColor.Color PointLight.Range = Radius PointLight.Shadows = true PointLight.Enabled = true PointLight.Parent = RadiusPartBase RadiusPartBase.Parent = RadiusModel RadiusBaseTop.Parent = RadiusModel Debris:AddItem(RadiusModel, 15) RadiusModel.Parent = game:GetService("Workspace") RadiusPartBase.CFrame = CFrame.new(HitPosition) + Vector3.new(0, (RadiusPartBase.Size.Y), 0) RadiusBaseTop.CFrame = RadiusPartBase.CFrame + Vector3.new(0, ((RadiusPartBase.Size.Y / 2) + (RadiusBaseTop.Size.Y / 2)), 0) local CurrentAnimation = 0 for i = 1, 25 do if not Equipped then break end local TestAnimation = (CurrentAnimation + 1) if Animations[TestAnimation] and R15Animations[TestAnimation] then CurrentAnimation = TestAnimation else CurrentAnimation = 1 end Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 0 Attack(CurrentAnimation) Spawn(function() local IgnoreObjects = {Character} local ModelCFrame = RadiusModel:GetModelCFrame() local ModelSize = RadiusModel:GetModelSize() local NegativePartRadius = Vector3.new((ModelSize.X / 2), (ModelSize.Y / 2), (ModelSize.Z / 2)) local PositivePartRadius = Vector3.new((ModelSize.X / 2), (ModelSize.Y / 2), (ModelSize.Z / 2)) local Parts = game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartsInRegion3WithIgnoreList(Region3.new(ModelCFrame.p - NegativePartRadius, ModelCFrame.p + PositivePartRadius), IgnoreObjects, 100) local Humanoids = {} for i, v in pairs(Parts) do if v and v.Parent then local character = v.Parent local humanoid = character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") if humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and not CheckTableForInstance(Humanoids, humanoid) then humanoid:TakeDamage(SpecialDamage) table.insert(Humanoids, humanoid) end end end end) end if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent then Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end if RadiusModel and RadiusModel.Parent then RadiusModel:Destroy() end SpecialActive = false end end end)
Tool.Enabled = true
function CheckTableForInstance(Table, Instance) for i, v in pairs(Table) do if v == Instance then return true end end return false end
function RayCast(Position, Direction, MaxDistance, IgnoreList) return game:GetService("Workspace"):FindPartOnRayWithIgnoreList(Ray.new(Position, Direction.unit * (MaxDistance or 999.999)), IgnoreList) end
function InvokeClient(Mode, Value) pcall(function() ClientControl:InvokeClient(Player, Mode, Value) end) end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function Attack(AnimationNumber) Sounds.Slash:Play() AnimationNumber = AnimationNumber or math.random(1, #Animations) local Animation = Animations[AnimationNumber] if Humanoid and Humanoid.RigType == Enum.HumanoidRigType.R15 then Animation = R15Animations[AnimationNumber] end InvokeClient("PlayAnimation", Animation) wait(Animation.Duration) end
function Blow(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent and Active then local humanoid = Hit.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if Character and Player and Humanoid and humanoid and humanoid ~= Humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and Humanoid.Health > 0 then local right_arm = Character:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") or Character:FindFirstChild("RightHand") if right_arm then local joint = right_arm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if joint and (joint.Part0 == Handle or joint.Part1 == Handle) then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) if humanoid.Health == 0 then Kills = (Kills + 1) if Kills >= KillsNeeded and not SpecialReady and not SpecialActive then SpecialReady = true Kills = 0 Sparkles = Instance.new("Sparkles") Sparkles.SparkleColor = Color3.new((255 / 255), (170 / 255), (0 / 255)) Sparkles.Enabled = true Sparkles.Parent = Handle end end end end end end end
function Equipped() Equipped = true Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") Torso = Character:FindFirstChild("Torso") or Character:FindFirstChild("UpperTorso") if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 or not Torso then return end Sounds.Unsheath:Play() end
function Unequipped() Equipped = false if Humanoid and Humanoid.Parent then Humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end if RadiusModel and RadiusModel.Parent then RadiusModel:Destroy() end end
Handle.Touched:connect(Blow)
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Players = game:GetService("Players")
Equipped = false
ServerControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ServerControl") ClientControl = Tool:WaitForChild("ClientControl")
ClientControl.OnClientInvoke = (function(Mode, Value) if not Equipped then return end if Mode == "PlayAnimation" then if AnimPlaying then AnimPlaying:Stop() end AnimPlaying = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Value.Animation) if AnimPlaying then AnimPlaying:Play(nil, nil, Value.Speed) end end end)
function InvokeServer(Mode, Value) pcall(function() ServerControl:InvokeServer(Mode, Value) end) end
function Equipped(Mouse) Equipped = true Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if not Player or not Humanoid or Humanoid.Health == 0 then return end Mouse.Button1Down:connect(function() InvokeServer("Click", true) end) Mouse.KeyDown:connect(function(Key) InvokeServer("KeyPress", {Key = Key, Down = true}) end) end
function Unequipped() Equipped = false if AnimPlaying then AnimPlaying:Stop() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)
